Dumpster Fire

Let‚Äôs start with the_silver_searcher again and see if we have any luck with ‚ÄúPassword‚Äù.

There‚Äôs a number of hits including references to an encryptedUsername and encryptedPassword in the logins.json file. So we‚Äôve got some encrypted Firefox user passwords. If only there were a utility that could decrypt those. Enter firepwd.py, an open source tool to decrypt Mozilla protected passwords.

Run the script in Python and point it to the directory for the user profile (where the logins.json file is).

That‚Äôs a pretty LEET password ;)
